title: Campton "Free" font
content:
Hi,

I want to know if there's accents and special characters for that Campton font. ( To be able to write in french )  
 [http://fontfabric.com/campton-free-font/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141838/http:/fontfabric.com/campton-free-font/ "http://fontfabric.com/campton-free-font/")

If not, is there any other similar font that would have the accents?

I want something modern, bold, friendly.

Thanks!
author: Ju22

comments.content: If you buy the font it has accents and special characters - the free Demo fonts do not have complete character sets.

Hi, Bonjour Ju22,

MyFonts let you see glyphs aviaible in the font.  
Campton got diacritics for french in paid weight. Demo weight are just here to test.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/rene-bieder/campton/book/glyphs.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141838/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/rene-bieder/campton/book/glyphs.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/rene-bieder/campton/book/glyphs.html")
